actions.command: item replace entity @s armor.head with adaptedorigins:soul_pumpkin{display:{Name:'[{"text":"Head of the Horseman","italic":false}]',Lore:['[{"text":"The grim countenance of the dullahan.","italic":false}]','[{"text":"In legend, the dullahan wields its severed head like a lantern.","italic":false}]']},Enchantments:[{id:binding_curse,lvl:1},{id:vanishing_curse,lvl:1},{id:protection,lvl:1}],HideFlags:1}

entity_action_removed.command: item replace entity @s armor.head with air

entity_action_lost.command: item replace entity @s armor.head with air

name: Horseman's Countenance
description: Your head is a hollow pumpkin illuminated by a cold blue flame. Its size hinders your ability to wear helmets.
